movies.title: Windstorm
movies.plot: Chaos. Disease. War and rumors of war throughout the world. Is this the end? For a group of strangers caught together fleeing Los Angeles, the answers are not so clear. And as the group takes shelter in the midst of a storm, one thing becomes apparent... the dangers of the world outside are nothing compared to what dwells among them in the shelter. Starring: William Beauhuld, Scott Ciampi, Sandra Gianozakos, Jasmine Kim, Dennis Luciani Directed by: Kevin Kane

biography.bio: William Beauhuld is an actor, known for Windstorm (2007).
biography.name: William Beauhuld

biography.bio: Scott Ciampi is an actor, known for Windstorm (2007) and Tumbleweed (2012).
biography.name: Scott Ciampi

biography.bio: Sandra Gianozakos is an actress, known for Windstorm (2007).
biography.name: Sandra Gianozakos

biography.bio: Jasmine Kim is known for her work on Windstorm (2007), The Abominable... (2006) and Drawn Together (2011).
biography.name: Jasmine Kim

biography.bio: Dennis Luciani, who describes himself as "almost an Army brat" was born on Westover Airforce base in Chicopee, Massachusetts. Being part of a military family meant not staying in one place for very long. Over the course of his childhood, Dennis attended two elementary schools two junior high schools and two different high schools. During his college years, Dennis majored in Accounting while minoring in Theatre. His love of acting was born out of his creative need to release his mind from his studies in accounting. Supporting himself as an Accounting Manager, Dennis moonlighted work in musical theatre. His luck improved when he landed a role in a commercial for Sullivan Bros Toyota which aired all across the southern region of Massachusetts. After that experience, Dennis knew he had to continue getting more work. He moved to Los Angeles to pursue his desire for professional acting. He made his screen debut in 2001 and has appeared across several video-productions, film shorts and documentaries. While not appearing on screen or stage, Dennis still utilizes his knowledge in accounting and has served as an accountant for several productions.
biography.name: Dennis Luciani

biography.bio: Jonathan Williams is an actor, known for Kabhi Alvida Naa Kehna (2006), Mirrors and Ghosts (2015) and Windstorm (2007).
biography.name: Jonathan Williams

biography.bio: Charles O'Hair is known for his work on Shamelove (2006), Asparagus (2007) and Across the Tracks (1990).
biography.name: Charles O'Hair
